Contact Details: Department for Communities Telephone: 028 9082 9000 Professional Services Unit Level 6 Causeway Exchange, 1-7 Bedford Street, Belfast BT2 7EG Tele: 028 9051 5424 email: psu@communities-ni.gov.uk
Description: The Northern Ireland Housing Bulletin is a quarterly bulletin containing information on new housing starts and completions, homelessness, the NI House Price Index and new house sales and prices.
Name: Northern Ireland housing bulletin
Notes: This datatset seems to be purely a summary of data contained in the Northern Ireland homelessness bulletin dataset.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified as latest version via link entitled Northern Ireland housing bulletin [Quarter] towards middle part of page under heading Northern Ireland housing bulletins. This opens a new page with the spreadsheet located under the heading Documents.
Sizing Notes: This datatset seems to be purely a summary of data contained in the Northern Ireland homelessness bulletin dataset, see this dataset for details.
